##Notice Details
This Request for Proposal (RFP) cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number 9F023-20230215 dated January 8, 2024.

The Canadian Space Agency is seeking services for high voltage maintenance at the David Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa. The agency requires High and Medium Voltage Maintenance work for the building's main sub-stations to cover labour and materials for repairs, maintenance, new installation, retrofits, and related work.

The RFP document is available for download at [Canadian Government Buy and Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

[Attachments]
* Equipment Inventory (Appendix 3)
